info.name: group_test_02
info.description:
Create 6 groups to test: 
Brightness with and without a dimmable fixture.
CCT group to test a CCT enabled fixture.
Red level of an RGBW fixture.
Green level of an RGBW fixture.
Blue level of an RGBW fixture.
White level of an RGBW fixture.

exec: tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200;

exec: tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200;
